about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in an unrivalled driving experience with the second part of the OMSI 2 Add-on Agora Bus Family. This exclusive add-on offers a faithful reproduction of the Euro 3 versions of the Irisbus Agora bus, a real gem for OMSI 2 driving simulation enthusiasts.

Discover four distinct models: the solo 2-door version, the solo 3-door, the articulated 3-door and the articulated 4-door, each offering a unique and immersive public transport experience.

Give free rein to your creativity with multiple customization options. Choose air conditioning for optimum comfort, activate door self-service for smooth automation, and select the door design that matches your style. A new feature in this DLC is the possibility to switch between a VDV and an RVI dashboard in the driver workspace. This way, an individual driving experience is achieved.

Don't miss this unique opportunity to enhance your OMSI 2 simulation. Climb aboard and explore the city with the OMSI 2 Add-on Agora Bus Family Citybus Vol. 2.

Take up the challenge of city driving and give your passengers an unforgettable ride on board of this generation of the Agora buses.

Features:
  • Solo and articulated bus versions
  • Two different dashboards: VDV and RVI
  • Different customizations
  • Krüger ++ LED exterior display
  • Authentic sounds
  • Numerous repaints included
  • Repaint guide is included
  • Setvar document explains the setting options

Discover four distinct models: the solo 2-door version, the solo 3-door, the articulated 3-door and the articulated 4-door, each offering a unique and immersive public transport experience.

Give free rein to your creativity with multiple customization options. Choose air conditioning for optimum comfort, activate door self-service for smooth automation, and select the door design that matches your style. A new feature in this DLC is the possibility to switch between a VDV and an RVI dashboard in the driver workspace. This way, an individual driving experience is achieved.

Don't miss this unique opportunity to enhance your OMSI 2 simulation. Climb aboard and explore the city with the OMSI 2 Add-on Agora Bus Family Citybus Vol. 2.

Take up the challenge of city driving and give your passengers an unforgettable ride on board of this generation of the Agora buses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-Core, e.g. Core i5 with 2.8 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with at least 1,024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Immerse yourself in an unrivalled driving experience and climb aboard and explore the city with the OMSI 2 Add-on Agora Bus Family Citybus Vol. 2.
supported_languages:
English, German*, French
*languages with full audio support
